WebHosting UK Windows 2008 Virtual Private Servers are powered by Hyper-V, a new server virtualization platform from Microsoft. The new Hyper-V Windows VPS range consists of three different plans and they are a superior alternative to our existing range of Virtuozzo based Windows VPS hosting plans. Hyper-V is a hypervisor-based technology that provides server virtualization in the form of complete isolation from other virtual machines on the same box.

Key features of Hyper-V Virtual Private Servers include :-

* Windows Server 2008 Operating system
* Completely Isolated Environment
* RDP Access to the VPS
* Administrative Access to install Applications
* Guaranteed RAM and Disk space
* Host Multiple Domains
* Unique IP addresses
* Ideal for test and development environments
